'''Seize the Day''' is a [[Recurring Event]] where player login for a daily login bonus.

Typically, while the login event lasts several weeks, there are only 7 days' worth of rewards. Players who log in for 7 days during the event, even if non-consecutively, will gain the full amount of rewards.

==Official Description==
Dear Travelers:

The Seize the Day daily login event has begun!

Log in seven days during the event to win great rewards!<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1310557371056390146 Event Announcement]</ref>

Rewards are eligible for players after achieving [[Adventure Rank]] 5.
